reviews.name: Austin Jones
reviews.comments: It was a challenging course, but I learned a lot and found a job in the field. The material goes above and beyond to prepare you for the real world of coding.

reviews.name: Justin Ames
reviews.comments: Fantastic bootcamp, I learned everything needed to find a job quickly. Starting from little coding knowledge, I was able to learn many great skills.

reviews.name: Charles Adams
reviews.comments: I had a great instructor and gained invaluable experience and tools for the industry. Career services helped in many ways during the course and afterwards.

reviews.name: Amanda Brown
reviews.comments: Taught outdated concepts and did not help at all with my job search. Impossible to learn using their videos.

reviews.name: Paul Williams
reviews.comments: Terribly disorganized, I would not recommend this bootcamp to anyone. Level of experience needed to understand was far more than advertised.

reviews.name: Haley James
reviews.comments: Can't say enough good things about this program, the instructors were always willing to help in any way possible.

reviews.name: Louis Pond
reviews.comments: This course had great content, but moved through topics too fast for me to fully understand them all.

reviews.name: Hank Johnson
reviews.comments: It was difficult at the beginning, but sticking through it led to me getting a great job. Career services helped me throughout my job search.
